[vc_row row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” anchor=”about” text_align=”left” video=”” background_color=”#ffffff” border_top_color=”#ffffff” border_color=”#ffffff” padding_top=”48″ padding_bottom=”70″ css_animation=”” box_shadow_on_row=”no” oblique_section=”no” oblique_section_top_and_bottom=”both” oblique_section_position=”from_left_to_right” triangle_shape=”no” triangle_shape_position=”both”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”50958″ img_size=”full” eltd_css_animation=””][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”30″ down=”0″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1646612630981{margin-top: 0px !important;border-top-width: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

Beautiful photos that tell your story

 

Whether you’re an individual looking to record a special event or a business seeking to connect with a wider audience, we’re passionate about helping you achieve your individual needs by showcasing the best of who you are. It all starts with you.

 

Whether it’s a personal photoshoot or branding for your business – we believe there is beauty in ordinary moments. In all things art, we aim to show what you are and not what others may expect. To showcase your love, triumph, passion and hard work. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” text_align=”left” video=”” background_color=”#ffffff” border_top_color=”#ffffff” border_color=”#ffffff” padding_top=”30″ padding_bottom=”70″ css_animation=”” box_shadow_on_row=”no” oblique_section=”no” oblique_section_top_and_bottom=”both” oblique_section_position=”from_left_to_right” triangle_shape=”no” triangle_shape_position=”both”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

A people-first approach to marketing

 

To grow and reach an audience, authentic photos are a strong foundation you need to connect with people. Whether you are new business and just getting off the ground or an existing brand looking to attract a larger audience – photography and marketing go hand in hand. 

 

Have a desire to reach people through social media, but don’t have the time? Whatever your needs we are here to support! With a couple headshots and photos of your product in hand, we can even make you a brand new website to showcase what you’re all about.


Our Services:

  • Photography…
  • Facebook & Instagram posts
  • Social media growth
  • Websites and blog
  • etc.

 

 

For the latest on our pricing packages, click here[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”50837″ img_size=”full” eltd_css_animation=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” anchor=”testimonials” text_align=”center” video=”” background_image=”50960″ css_animation=”” box_shadow_on_row=”no” oblique_section=”no” oblique_section_top_and_bottom=”both” oblique_section_position=”from_left_to_right” triangle_shape=”no” triangle_shape_position=”both”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-lg-10 vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-10 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”130″ down=”0″][no_elements_holder number_of_columns=”one_column”][no_elements_holder_item aligment=”center” advanced_animations=”yes” start_position=”bottom” end_position=”center” start_animation_style=”opacity: 0;” end_animation_style=”opacity: 1;”][vc_column_text]

Testimonials

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”30″ down=”0″]

  • Decent priced and very willing to go extra mile. Amazing work, very kind.

    - Carrie Madu

  • Tara was amazing. We loved her energy and our family photos are stunning!

    - Lisa Last

[/no_elements_holder_item][/no_elements_holder][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”70″ down=”0″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” anchor=”vision” text_align=”left” video=”” background_color=”#ffffff” border_top_color=”#ffffff” border_color=”#ffffff” padding_top=”24″ padding_bottom=”15″ css_animation=”” box_shadow_on_row=”no” oblique_section=”no” oblique_section_top_and_bottom=”both” oblique_section_position=”from_left_to_right” triangle_shape=”no” triangle_shape_position=”both”][vc_column][vc_text_separator title=”Our Vision” text_in_box=”no” text_position=”center” line_color=”#222222″ line_width=”36″ line_thickness=”1″ line_border_style=”solid” up=”48″ down=”32″ line_dots=”no” box_margin=”-20px”][vc_tabs style=”horizontal” tab_type_default=”default” space_between_tab_and_content=”50″][vc_tab icon_pack=”font_awesome” fa_icon=”” title=”Photography” tab_id=”1426668772442-10604b-7a98″][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” use_row_as_full_screen_section_slide=”no” text_align=”left” css_animation=”” box_shadow_on_row=”no”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”50830″ img_size=”full” eltd_css_animation=””][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”38″ down=”0″][vc_column_text]

We’ll meet you where you’re at

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”22″ down=”0″][vc_column_text]We’re not interested in pushy upsells or maximizing our bottom line, we’re hear to listen to you and help you achieve your goals on your timeline. Whatever your needs and priorities, we can help you navigate all things web & marketing.[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”40″ down=”0″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”50825″ img_size=”full” eltd_css_animation=””][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”38″ down=”0″][vc_column_text]

We believe in authenticity

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”22″ down=”0″][vc_column_text]Whether its a lakeside photoshoot showing the special connection of your family or staff & office photos supporting the branding of your business, we’re committed to finding and showing off those special details that tell your story![/vc_column_text][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”40″ down=”0″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tab][/vc_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” text_align=”left” video=”” background_color=”#ffffff” border_top_color=”#ffffff” border_color=”#ffffff” padding_bottom=”45″ css_animation=”” box_shadow_on_row=”no” oblique_section=”no” oblique_section_top_and_bottom=”both” oblique_section_position=”from_left_to_right” triangle_shape=”no” triangle_shape_position=”both”][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”50821″ img_size=”full” eltd_css_animation=””][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”35″ down=”0″][vc_column_text]

Photography

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”20″ down=”0″][vc_column_text]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tation ullamcorper suscipit lobortis nisldolore[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”35″ down=”0″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”50961″ img_size=”full” eltd_css_animation=””][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”35″ down=”0″][vc_column_text]

Social Media

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”20″ down=”0″][vc_column_text]Marketing can feel like an endless cycle of googling terms and getting things half right. Please, do not do that to yourself. We are here to help make sure you have a brand that will draw in your ideal client and make your vision come true.[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”35″ down=”0″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”50962″ img_size=”full” eltd_css_animation=””][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”35″ down=”0″][vc_column_text]

Websites

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”20″ down=”0″][vc_column_text]Get your message out there with a beautiful handcrafted website, like this one! It could it’s a full featured landing page, creative portfolio, or just something small to start off – we guarantee it’ll be made with love![/vc_column_text][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”35″ down=”0″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” anchor=”pricing” text_align=”center” video=”” background_image=”50918″ background_color=”#ffffff” border_top_color=”#ffffff” border_color=”#ffffff” padding_top=”85″ padding_bottom=”120″ css_animation=”” box_shadow_on_row=”no” oblique_section=”no” oblique_section_top_and_bottom=”both” oblique_section_position=”from_left_to_right” triangle_shape=”no” triangle_shape_position=”both” el_id=”pricing”][vc_column el_id=”pricing”][vc_text_separator title=”Pricing” text_in_box=”no” text_position=”center” line_color=”#ffffff” line_width=”36″ line_thickness=”1″ line_border_style=”solid” up=”0″ down=”64″ line_dots=”no” box_margin=”-20px” title_color=”#ffffff”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”30″ down=”0″][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”15″ down=”0″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1648245618127{border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” use_row_as_full_screen_section_slide=”no” text_align=”center” css_animation=”” box_shadow_on_row=”no”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]Book now[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]Book now[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]Book now[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” anchor=”team” text_align=”left” video=”” background_color=”#ffffff” border_top_color=”#ffffff” border_color=”#ffffff” padding_top=”40″ css_animation=”” box_shadow_on_row=”no” oblique_section=”no” oblique_section_top_and_bottom=”both” oblique_section_position=”from_left_to_right” triangle_shape=”no” triangle_shape_position=”both”][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_text_separator title=”Our Team” text_in_box=”no” text_position=”center” line_color=”#222222″ line_width=”36″ line_thickness=”1″ line_border_style=”solid” up=”24″ down=”7″ line_dots=”no” box_margin=”-20px”][vc_column_text]

Platonic soul mates Meg + Tara met on the North Shuswap. Quickly they realized the had the same vision for their families and entrepreneurial spirits. It was time to merge their talents and passions. Between raising their kids and a few strong coffee’s, Owl + Sparrow was born.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” text_align=”left” video=”” background_color=”#ffffff” border_top_color=”#ffffff” border_color=”#ffffff” padding_top=”45″ padding_bottom=”55″ css_animation=”” box_shadow_on_row=”no” oblique_section=”no” oblique_section_top_and_bottom=”both” oblique_section_position=”from_left_to_right” triangle_shape=”no” triangle_shape_position=”both”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”10″ down=”0″][vc_column_text]

Meg O

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”25″ down=”0″][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”30″ down=”0″][vc_column_text]A grateful immigrant to the land of mountains and lakes, Meg found her little piece of paradise in North Shuswap a year ago. Becoming a paid artist was a dream not thought possible. After supporting local companies with their marketing and social media needs she has now found a happy work life balance helped by the missing piece to the business puzzle: Tara.[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”20″ down=”0″][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”50″ down=”0″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”10″ down=”0″][vc_column_text]

Tara C

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”25″ down=”0″][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”30″ down=”0″][vc_column_text]A military brat, Tara has lived across Canada and has always had a passion for people watching and rock music. She got her first camera as a gift in 2018 and completed a handful of classes to learn the craft. She was filled with inspiration for photography from the beginning but was able to finally fulfill the dream in 2021 with the encouragement of Meg. Tara lives in the rural North Shuswap with her husband, 2 sons and dog.[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”20″ down=”0″][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”50″ down=”0″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” video=”” background_color=”#ffffff” border_top_color=”#ffffff” border_color=”#ffffff” css_animation=”” box_shadow_on_row=”no”][vc_column]

Our Fav Quotes

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type=”transparent” up=”30″ down=”0″]

  • Just be yourself. Let people see the real, imperfect, flawed, quirky, weird, beautiful, magical person you are

    - Mandy Hale

  • Find your equal, not your whole

    -

  • What you are looking for is not out there. It is inside you

    -

  • You got your passion, you got your pride. But don't you know that only fools are satisfied?

    - Billy Joel

  • Do whatever makes you happiest

    -

    -
